MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA2 postcode area Paisley. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:25pm due to safety concerns with our underground cable network on Finglas Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:31pm on Wednesday, 17 March 2021
